subject: Re: Intro and question
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Greetings diazwoman,

The "split cord to do both" you asked about is a Y-Cable Adapter.  
Radio Shack has them.  The part number is 42-2496.  I use them all 
the time.  You can then plug in a recorder and speaker or ear buds at 
the same time.

Enjoy... and welcome!
- Mike C. (UFO Geek)
